edu.cnm.deepdive.worldofwardrobe.fragments

Class OutfitFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.worldofwardrobe.fragments.OutfitFragment

  • public class OutfitFragment
extends Object
    The OutfitFragment display the one of each selected item type from the Top, Bottom, and Accessories Fragemtn to form an outfit.

      static String PHOTO_FILE
      A string for photo file to use in a serialize saved state.

      • onCreateView

        public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater,
                         ViewGroup container,
                         Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Display each referenced imageview and close the shoe to flip the shoe image by using matrix and show it on the 2nd shoe ImageView.
        Parameters:
        inflater - for the fragment_outfit layout
        container - container for view
        savedInstanceState - save the state
        Returns:
        the view for this fragment

      • onActivityCreated

        This keep the selected item images from disappearing when user is 2 fragment screen away form this fragment
        Parameters:

      • onSaveInstanceState
